message: Let's split it evenly. No need for inflation to ruin our deal!
You should have taken my first offer!
Let's try to make a deal.  I'm willing to give you a little less than my initial offer to keep things moving.
I'm still willing to compromise, but I can't accept getting less than I did in my first offer. Let's find some middle ground.
I'm increasing my offer again. It's getting very risky for both of us with the inflation. Let's make a deal before it's too late!
You should have taken one of my earlier offers...
The inflation is getting out of control! I'm taking a huge risk, but I think this is the last chance for a fair deal.  Let's settle now.
Last chance before I take it all...
This is my final offer.  The inflation is going to wipe out almost all of the value for me.  If you want to get anything, you need to accept this!
